book.title: The Bone Shard Daughter
book.author: Andrea G. Stewart
book.description: The Bone Shard Daughter is a 2020 fantasy book by Andrea Stewart. It is the first book in the Drowning Empire trilogy. The book is about Lin, the emperor's daughter, who is trapped in a palace. When her father refuses to recognize her as heir to the throne, she vows to prove her worth by mastering the forbidden art of bone shard magic.

book.title: Under the Whispering Door
book.author: TJ Klune
book.description: Under the Whispering Door is a contemporary fantasy novel by T.J. Klune. It's about a ghost who refuses to cross over and the ferryman he falls in love with. The story explores themes of found family, self-discovery, and grief. Some say it's a charming standalone story that's hilarious, haunting, and kind.

book.title: What the River Knows
book.author: Isabel Ibañez
book.description: What the River Knows is a historical fantasy novel by Isabel Ibañez. It's the first book in the Secrets of the Nile duology. The story is about Inez Olivera, a young heiress from Buenos Aires, who sets out to discover the truth about her parents' disappearance. The book explores themes of grief, trust, and colonialism. Some say the book is a "love letter to history" and a "beautiful historical fiction".
